EasyXLS.Charts

Class ExcelDataLabels

  • System.Object
    • EasyXLS.Drawings.DrawingObject
      • EasyXLS.Drawings.LineDrawingObject
        • EasyXLS.Drawings.FillDrawingObject
          • EasyXLS.Drawings.EffectDrawingObject
            • EasyXLS.Drawings.FontDrawingObject
              • EasyXLS.Drawings.AlignDrawingObject
                • EasyXLS.Charts.ExcelDataLabels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAlignDrawingObject, IEffectDrawingObject, IFontDrawingObject

    public class ExcelDataLabels
extends AlignDrawingObject
    This class stores the data labels settings like label options, number format, fill settings, line settings, (font settings), 3D-format settings, alignment settings and shadow settings.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExcelDataLabels()
      Defines an instance of the data label.

      Returns the label separator.
      bool getShowLegendKeyNextToLabel()
      Returns a value representing the visibility of the legend key.
      bool IsNumberFormatLinked()
      Returns true, if the number format of the labels is the same as the number format of the data source, false otherwise.

      Sets the label position.

      Sets the data label number format.

      Sets if the number format of the data label is linked to the number format of the data source.

      Sets the label separator.

      Sets if the bubble size is visible in the data label.

      Sets if the leader lines are visible.

      Sets the visibility of the legend key next to label of the series.

      Sets if the percentage is visible in the data label.

      Sets if the series name is visible in the data label.
